+import { User } from '../models/user';
+import { Template } from '../templates';
+
+export interface NotificationOptions {
+  channel: 'email' | 'sms' | 'push';
+  priority: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high';
+}
+
+export class NotificationService {
+  private readonly providers: Map<string, NotificationProvider>;
+
+  constructor() {
+    this.providers = new Map();
+  }
+
+  registerProvider(channel: string, provider: NotificationProvider) {
+    this.providers.set(channel, provider);
+  }
+
+  async notify(user: User, message: string, options: NotificationOptions) {
+    const provider = this.providers.get(options.channel);
+    if (!provider) {
+      throw new Error(`No provider registered for channel: ${options.channel}`);
+    }
+
+    const template = Template.render(message, { user });
+    return provider.send(user, template, options.priority);
+  }
+
+  async notifyBatch(users: User[], message: string, options: NotificationOptions) {
+    const results = await Promise.allSettled(
+      users.map(user => this.notify(user, message, options))
+    );
+
+    const failed = results.filter(r => r.status === 'rejected');
+    if (failed.length > 0) {
+      console.warn(`${failed.length} notifications failed`);
+    }
+
+    return {
+      sent: results.filter(r => r.status === 'fulfilled').length,
+      failed: failed.length,
+    };
+  }
+}
